meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both <kanji>cottage</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You got this <kanji>cottage</kanji> from a <reading>sha</reading>man (しゃ). In fact, everyone you know got their cottage from a shaman. One day you're just walking in the woods, and the next thing you know, a shaman is giving you the keys to their old cottage.
